settings.subheading: Free Click & Collect to US stores*

settings.title: Custom Workwear
settings.text: Curate an impeccable corporate image with a workwear collection crafted exclusively for your company. Collaborate with our in-house designers and explore a diverse range of comfortable options. Our goal is to tailor workwear that seamlessly aligns with your needsa perfect fusion of functionality and style.

settings.title: CORPORATE SERVICES
settings.text: Pair text with an image to tell a story

settings.title: HEADLINE
settings.text:
At Helt studio, we believe in providing you with a functional uniform that reflects the modern pace of your business. Not only should your uniform look the part (well-designed, stylish, premium fabric), it should also be highly functional (high-performance, breathable, comfortable)

Our ultimate goal is for staff to be happy and comfortable in their uniform and for business to look their best.

settings.title: NOT ALL HEROES WEAR CAPES
settings.text: You know better than anyone the importance of excellent service. Please allow us to provide you with that experience. We believe good designs puts functionality at its heart, which is why we obsess over every detail, every button, every seams to ensure our uniforms not only look the part, but are high performing. We love what your drive, your passion and your focus at what you do. You are a hero to us, and you deserve to wear something that works for you. At the end of the day, not all heroes wear capes.

settings.title: ORIGINAL DESIGN
settings.text: With over 10 years of industry experience shared amongst our designers, we are single-minded about evolving the definition of anultimate uniform. In fact, we are constantly releasing new products and styles each year to enhance and grow our product range.

settings.title: DIRECT TO CLIENT VALUE
settings.text: As one of the first businesses to sellwholesale priced, quality uniforms direct to clients online, we helped to move the dinosaur uniform industry into the 21st century (youre welcome!).

settings.title: WORLD CLASS INNOVATION
settings.text:
At Helt Studio, we go to obsessive lengths to produce custom fabric solutions that teams love to wear fabric thats easy-care, breathable, sweat-masking, non-pilling and holds its shape, wash after wash.

In fact, we spend 10,000 hours on apparel Research & Development each year to ensure we create fabrics and uniforms that are led by innovation.

settings.title: CUSTOMER FIRST
settings.text:
At Helt Studio, our dedicated customer specialist provides the service and excellence that you deserve and rely upon.

Ok, so youre in charge of finding the perfect uniform that your team will love to wear. And it also needs to encapsulate your brand and company values. Oh, and it needs to be at on time and to budget, but not sacrifice on quality. While it might sound like Mission Ridiculous, dont be deterred. Youre in the right place and we promise to make the entire uniform supply process seamless, simple and (dare we say) fun!

For companies requiring a fast turnaround, we offer an extensive capsule collection of over 150 Modern Uniform styles that can be mixed and matched with the help of a highly experienced single-pointCustomer Care Specialist.

settings.title: Take 15% off
settings.text:
Subscribe to take 15% OFF your first purchase and stay in the know on exclusive new colors, styles and promotions.

By clicking "sign up", you agree to receive emails from Helt Studio and accept ourTerms of Useand ourPrivacy Policy.

settings.first-desc:
For almost half a decade, Helt Studio has set out on a mission to support and celebrate our culinary frontline heroes. Our mission to empower the culinary community through producing functional, high-quality, and trendy kitchen apparel has helped culinary workers feel their best and look good doing it. However, improving the landscape for restaurant workers is so much more than creating the right gear we want to go even further.

Helt Studios chef blog continues that mission by letting you hear directly from expert contributors in the industry. Hospitality is one of the most complex and labor-intensive businesses in the country. Through providing helpful resources and stories, we hope to help chefs and restaurateurs tackle many of the challenges they often face in the field.
settings.second-desc:
Our blog features articles about uniforms and chef wear, culinary tips, restaurant trends, leaders in hospitality, industry advice, anecdotal stories, recipes, and other relevant content. Whether youre a chef, barista, bartender, busser, server, or restaurant manager our chef blog serves as a useful and invaluable tool to help you grow in your career.

Culinary workers have been neglected by the industry for far too long. Were passionate about changing that giving culinary workers the support, resources, and appreciation they deserve.

After all, aprons are just capes worn backward.
settings.third-desc: If you would like to hear about a specific topic or think you might have something helpful to contribute,wed love to hear from you.

settings.subheading: What you wear to work should work for you.
settings.text: At Helt Studio, we strive to craft uniforms that epitomize unparalleled comfort. We firmly hold the belief that your work attire should elevate your performance, enabling you to make a substantial impact without being encumbered by discomfort from your workwear.

settings.title: Embracing Innovative Design
settings.text: Central to each of our uniform creations is a meticulously engineered fabric designed to outperform everything else in your wardrobe. Incorporating elements like sweat-wicking and liquid repellent fabric inspired clothes wear by pro-athletes , along with machine-washable, high-performance Denim and Canvas, our fabrics undergo thorough research and testing, ensuring they're primed to enhance your day with unparalleled comfort and productivity.

settings.title: KEEPING YOU SAFE
settings.text: Introducing Helt's Hand sanitizer. Keeping you safe and clean all the time

settings.title: CREATE A UNIQUE LOOK FOR YOUR TEAM
Innovation. Functionality. Style. Comfort.
settings.text: As a disruptive corporate apparel design company, we give you corporate uniforms that your employees would love to wear while presenting your professional brand identity. We are trendsetters in the industry, providing meaningful and purposeful apparel reflecting your business at its best.

settings.title: Unique Design
settings.text: At Helt Studio, we believe in innovation. We understand that your business is unique, and your employees attire should reflect that uniqueness and spirit. We infuse life into the essence of your brand through our innovative design.

settings.title: Fabric Innovation
settings.text: Uniform is not just about design. It is much more than that. It delivers comfort, functionality, high performance, and style that become a hallmark of your corporate identity. Helt Studio is a pioneering company that incorporated tech fabric with superior performance into corporate uniform manufacturing.

settings.title: Client-Centric Approach
settings.text: As a leading corporate uniform designer and manufacturer in the industry, we have a client-centric approach. We deliver direct-to-client value for every project. Our team diligently works with you while focusing on building a long-term relationship via our uniform. For us, clients are just like our family.

settings.title: Quality Assurance
settings.text: At Helt Studio, we have a strong disliking for poor quality fabric, regular designs, and ill-fitting uniforms. Without the fabric and design quality, it's not possible to make our products shine. You and your workers deserve something unique, and we help you get that. We incorporate functionality and excellent quality into our creations to make your uniform stand apart and fit perfectly.

settings.title: INTERESTED IN WORKING WITH US?
settings.text: We are proud to dress crews across America and the world in our premium staff uniforms. We have catered to a wide range of industries including coffee roasters, cafs, restaurants, food franchises, boutique hotels, bakeries, catering companies, wineries, cinemas, car dealerships, butchers... the list goes on!

settings.title: BE PART OF THE TEAM
settings.text: We work with passionate folks at all scales, from international chains to local favorites to mom and pop shops. You imagine it, we will build it.
We are committed to making all kitchen workers feel celebrated. Contact us today to buy modern, amazing chef uniforms for your workforce.

settings.title: Look Good. Feel Good. Work Better.
settings.text: Avoid discomfort with the right chef uniforms and kitchen staff apparel by Helt Studio.

settings.title: Your uniform can do much more
NEWSLETTER
settings.subheading: Sign up for exclusive offers, original stories, activism awareness, events and more.
settings.note: Note: You can opt-out at any time. See our Privacy Policy and Terms.

settings.title: MADE FOR YOUR TEAM
settings.text: Stand out instead of blending in! If you have a vision for how your team should look, delve into our Apron Customization program. Choose from a selection of over 200 fabric options, incorporate your logo and corporate colors, and craft something uniquely tailored to your team. Our designer will work with you to make your vision come true.

settings.headline: CHEF COAT
settings.description: Made with Crewtech Fabric. Sweat-wicking, water & stain-repellent, 4 way stretch. Ultimate comfort

settings.headline: DWR DENIM APRON
settings.description: The denim that is water & stain-repellent, without the waxy coating.

settings.headline: UTILITY SHIRT
settings.description: Made with Crewtech Lite. Breathable, lightweight, water-repellent and 4 way stretch

settings.about_description: Helt Studio, a modern chef uniform store, began with one simple idea what you wear to work should work for you.

settings.about_headline: Built for comfort, style, and functionality.
settings.about_description: Helt Studios uniforms are built for comfort, style, and functionality, using technologically advanced fabrics that make our customers and their teams proud to go to work. Our chef uniform store elevates uniforms from mediocrity and creates products that our customers are excited to wear every day for both their quality and the brand they represent.

settings.about_text: We reimagined uniform design from the ground up with performance fabrics sourced from around the world and designs made right here in Los Angeles. When we began, we saw that many apparel brands didnt care enough to offer uniforms that are targeted to the everyday life of the ordinary kitchen worker. After years of their disruption in the field, we believe that our uniforms have changed the space for the better.

settings.highlight_description: No flashy logos. No senseless details. Just the worlds most comfortable shoes, made naturally and designed practically. Its that simple.
Trying is believing. Give our shoes a shot for 30 days, and if youre not walking on cloud nine, well take them backno questions asked.
The footwear industry often overlooks Mother Natures materials in favor of cheaper, synthetic alternatives. We think its time to change that.
As a certified B Corp, we do business differently. The environment is a stakeholder here, and how we treat it is just as important as the bottom line.
Thanks to our friends at Soles4Souls, lightly used Allbirds find new life all around the world, helping communities in need thrive in the process.
We reimagined shoe packaging, using 90% post-consumer recycled cardboard that serves as a shoebox, shopping bag, and mailer all in one.

settings.highlight_main_description: The journey to making better things in a better way is a long one, and were just getting started. Here are a few of our proudest moments so far:

settings.collection_description: Our first innovative uniform solution featuring a water-repelling, 4-way stretch, sweat-wicking material that keeps the wearer cool, moisture-free, and clean. With that, Helts first chef coat was born.

The lighter version of our original CrewTech Fabric. Offering the same function and performance, CrewTech Lite was the lighter, more breathable innovative uniform solution and little brother of our flagship CrewTech Fabric.

Unlike traditional canvas aprons sold by other chef uniform companies that stain and absorb liquids through to the wearers clothes, our Durable Water-Repellent Coating added a protective barrier. This offered added protection from liquids seeping through like grease, sauces, and other messy liquids encountered in the kitchen  keeping chefs lookin fresh even after the messiest shift.

Unlike traditional canvas aprons sold by other chef uniform companies that stain and absorb liquids through to the wearers clothes, our Durable Water-Repellent Coating added a protective barrier. This offered added protection from liquids seeping through like grease, sauces, and other messy liquids encountered in the kitchen  keeping chefs lookin fresh even after the messiest shift.

settings.science_description: Unlike other chef uniform companies, it has always been Helts mission to celebrate chefs and kitchen workers as the frontline heroes they are. Having been neglected by the industry for far too long, we are committed to producing uniform solutions that make frontline workers look and feel their best shift after shift  all made ethically in the U.S.A.
